description: This header file defines internal API function prototypes for the Slap Service Component Object in the SLAP framework, including functions for object naming, type handling, lifecycle management, and method invocation.

methods.name: SlapScoGetObjName2
methods.description: Retrieves the object name associated with the given SLAP object handle.

methods.name: SlapScoSetObjName
methods.description: Sets the object name for the given SLAP object handle.

methods.name: SlapScoGetObjType
methods.description: Retrieves the type identifier of the SLAP object.

methods.name: SlapScoEngage
methods.description: Engages or activates the SLAP service component object.

methods.name: SlapScoCancel
methods.description: Cancels or deactivates the SLAP service component object.

methods.name: SlapScoMatch1
methods.description: Checks whether the object name and instance ID match specific criteria within the SLAP object.

methods.name: SlapScoInvokeDispatch
methods.description: Invokes the specified method on the SLAP object with parameters and retrieves the result.

methods.name: SlapScoConvertParams
methods.description: Converts a list of input parameters into another parameter list within the SLAP framework.
